item.title: 高盛称对冲基金周二抛售中国股票创历史新高
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）的交易员报告称，对冲基金周二卖出了创纪录数量的中国股票。【原文：Hedge funds sold a record amount of Chinese shares on Tuesday after a weeklong holiday that lacked more major stimulus, according to a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. trader note.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 谷歌的 "反什么 "案例缺少一个泰迪-罗斯福
item.description:
从表面上看，有关大科技公司的反垄断辩论听起来就像 120 年前的美国，但这次似乎没人在乎。【原文：

On the surface, the antitrust debate over Big Tech sounds like America 120 years ago — but this time, no one seems to care.

】

item.title: 德国电信宣布回购高达 20 亿欧元的股票
item.description: 德国电信公司（Deutsche Telekom AG）表示，计划在 2025 年提出一项高达 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的回购计划，并将增加股息。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG said it plans to propose a buyback program of as much as €2 billion ($2.2 billion) for 2025 and will increase its dividend.】

item.title: 基金入股表现不佳公司，日本雄狮股价大涨
item.description: 在一家日本参与基金入股这家国内牙膏和其他家用产品制造商之后，Lion Corp. 的股价最高上涨了 7.4%，创下两个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of Lion Corp. rose as much as 7.4%, the most in two months, after a Japanese engagement fund took a stake in the domestic maker of toothpastes and other household products.】

item.title: 中国交易卡制造商凯友被指推迟香港上市计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国动漫主题交易卡和文具制造商凯友公司已经推迟了在香港首次公开募股的计划，因为该公司尚未获得中国证券监管机构的上市批准。【原文：Kayou, a Chinese maker of trading cards and stationery with animation themes, has pushed back its plan for an initial public offering in Hong Kong because it hasn’t received approval to list from China’s securities regulator, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约市公寓租户获得喘息机会，但仍难淘到便宜货
item.description: 9 月份，纽约的房租继续下滑，但希望房租得到明显缓解的租房者可能还需要等待很长时间。【原文：New York rents continued ticking down in September, but apartment hunters hoping for significant relief may have a long wait.】

item.title: Hodinkee 向波士顿经销商出售二手钟表网站 Crown & Caliber
item.description: Hodinkee Inc. 已将其不到四年前不明智收购的在线二手钟表零售商 Crown & Caliber 出售给美国最大的经销商之一。【原文：Hodinkee Inc. has sold Crown & Caliber, the online used watch retailer it bought in an ill-advised move less than four years ago, to one of the largest dealers in the US.】

item.title: 西班牙敦促欧盟避免对华保护主义升级
item.description: 西班牙最高经济官员表示，欧盟和中国必须继续谈判，以避免保护主义措施升级，从而导致双方经济 "双输 "的局面。【原文：The European Union and China must continue talks to avoid an escalation of protectionist measures that would lead to a “lose-lose” situation for both economies, Spain’s top economic official said.】

item.title: 私募基金亿万富翁寻求破坏瑞士与欧盟谈判
item.description: 瑞士为达成一项新协议以管理与欧盟的关系所做的努力遇到了新的实质性反对，反对者是 Partners Group Holding AG 公司的三位亿万富翁创始人。【原文：Switzerland’s efforts to forge a new deal to govern relations with the European Union have run into substantial new opposition, in the form of the three billionaire founders of Partners Group Holding AG.】

item.title: 巴尼耶的预算案对法国至关重要：值得关注
item.description: 法国即将公布应对赤字膨胀的初步休克疗法方案，旨在安抚持怀疑态度的债券投资者，并在四分五裂的议会中化解强大的反对势力。【原文：France is about to unveil its initial course of shock therapy to tackle swelling deficits, aiming to reassure skeptical bond investors and navigate forceful opposition in a fractured parliament.】

item.title: 在伦敦机场，工党的经济和绿色雄心发生冲突
item.description: 伦敦城市机场是通往英国首都金融区的重要枢纽，当工党批准在该机场增加航班时，这最终成为了一个折中的决定，最终谁也不满意。【原文：When the Labour Party approved more flights at London City Airport, a key hub for travelers to the UK capital’s financial districts, it ended up being a compromise decision that ultimately pleased no one.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦经济学家下调印度股市，认为中国股市将进一步上涨
item.description: Bernstein 法国兴业银行集团的亚洲量化策略师因估值问题下调了印度股市的评级，同时预测中国股市将在政策推动下进一步上扬。【原文：Bernstein Societe Generale Group’s Asia quant strategists have downgraded Indian stocks due to valuations, while predicting further upside for Chinese equities on a policy boost.】

item.title: 野村向日本监管机构承认操纵政府债券
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. admitted to Japan’s financial regulator that it had manipulated the government bond futures market, following a probe by the securities watchdog into transactions three years ago.】

item.title: 墨西哥迈出扩大联邦能源控制的第一步
item.description: 墨西哥立法者迈出了第一步，将授予总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆政府对国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）和电力公司联邦电力公司（Comision Federal de Electricidad）更多的控制权。【原文：Mexican lawmakers took the first step toward granting President Claudia Sheinbaum’s administration more control over state oil firm Petroleos Mexicanos and electricity utility Comision Federal de Electricidad.】

item.title: 关注中国简报，铜从两周低点反弹
item.description: 铜从两周多来的最低收盘价回升，原因是在中国政府举行备受期待的政策吹风会之前，工业品走势飘忽不定。【原文：Copper rose from its lowest close in more than two weeks as industrial commodities drifted before a keenly anticipated policy briefing by China’s government.】

item.title: 据说查尔斯-莫纳特（Charles Monat）将考虑出售公司业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，查尔斯-莫纳特联合有限公司（Charles Monat Associates Ltd.）是一家面向高净值人士的全球性人寿保险经纪公司，在潜在投资者的关注下，该公司正在探索出售业务。【原文：Charles Monat Associates Ltd., a global life insurance broker for high-net-worth individuals, is exploring a sale of the business amid interest from prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高价股刺激印度市场的分化定位
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: OpenAI 主席的初创公司正在筹集价值超过 40 亿美元的资金
item.description: 一位熟悉该交易的人士称，OpenAI 主席布雷特-泰勒（Bret Taylor）的 Sierra 公司正在洽谈以 40 多亿美元的估值获得新的融资，这凸显了投资者对人工智能的持续兴趣，尽管他们担心初创公司的价格会膨胀。【原文：OpenAI Chairman Bret Taylor’s Sierra is in talks to secure new funding at a $4 billion-plus valuation, a person familiar with the deal said, underscoring sustained investor interest in AI despite concerns about ballooning startup price tags.】

item.title: 亚马逊将 Apple TV+ 添加至其流媒体频道商店
item.description: 亚马逊公司将把苹果公司的 TV+ 流媒体服务添加到其在美国的频道商店中，首次在其视频超市中提供《Ted Lasso》和《Slow Horses》等热门影片。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is adding Apple Inc.’s TV+ streaming service to its channels store in the US, offering hits such as Ted Lasso and Slow Horses in its video supermarket for the first time.】

item.title: 美国卡车零部件制造商 Accuride 申请破产保护
item.description: 商用卡车零部件制造商 Accuride 公司在美国货运业衰退的背景下耗尽现金，于周三申请破产保护。【原文：Commercial-truck parts maker Accuride Corp. filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection Wednesday after the company burned through cash amid a freight industry recession in the US.】

item.title: 关注财政部简报，中国股市重拾涨势
item.description: 中国股市反弹，因为市场押注政府将在周六的发布会上推出新的财政刺激措施。【原文：Chinese stocks rebounded amid bets that the government will unveil fresh fiscal stimulus at a planned Saturday briefing.】

item.title: 韩国金融科技领导者选择前 eBay 经理填补首席执行官空缺
item.description: 韩国最大的金融科技初创企业的经纪部门 Toss Securities Co.【原文：Toss Securities Co., the brokerage arm of South Korea’s largest fintech startup, is close to appointing a former entrepreneur and eBay Inc. manager to the top post.】

item.title: 华兴资本任命创始人包凡的妻子为主席
item.description: 华兴资本控股有限公司（China Renaissance Holdings Ltd.）表示，在其创始人包凡卸任八个月后，公司任命包凡的妻子为新任董事长。【原文：China Renaissance Holdings Ltd. said it appointed the wife of founder Bao Fan as its new chairperson, eight months after the star banker’s exit from the role.】

item.title: Etsy 首席财务官利用人工智能为经济 "萧条 "的用户打气
item.description: 面对不确定的经济前景，Etsy 公司正在寻找新的方法来吸引其 9500 多万活跃用户消费。这家在线市场的首席财务官指望人工智能和云技术的帮助。【原文：Faced with an uncertain economic outlook, Etsy Inc. is looking for new ways to get its more than 95 million active users to spend. The online marketplace’s chief financial officer is counting on help from artificial intelligence and the cloud.】

item.title: 埃克森公司计划增加圭亚那斯塔布鲁克区块的产量
item.description: 埃克森美孚圭亚那国家经理阿利斯泰尔-劳特利奇（Alistair Routledge）周三表示，一旦完成风险评估并获得当地政府批准，埃克森美孚圭亚那公司计划将其圭亚那近海斯塔布鲁克区块的产量提高 18,000 桶/日。【原文：ExxonMobil Guyana plans to increase output from its Stabroek block offshore Guyana by 18,000 barrels per day (bpd) once it has completed risk assessments and received approval from local authorities, country manager Alistair Routledge said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 飓风米尔顿携强风登陆佛罗里达州
item.description: 飓风 "米尔顿 "以摧枯拉朽之势猛烈袭击了佛罗里达州坦帕附近的西海岸，将一堵水墙推向海岸，使这一人口稠密地区的生命受到威胁。【原文：Hurricane Milton slammed into Florida’s west coast near Tampa with tree-snapping winds, pushing a wall of water onshore and putting lives at risk in the densely populated region.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，道明将因洗钱失败面临美国增长限制和 30 亿美元罚款
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）将支付约 30 亿美元的罚金，并在美国的发展将面临限制。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank will pay about $3 billion in penalties and face restrictions on its US growth in a settlement with regulators over its failure to catch money laundering, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 经济衰退风险定价错误，木星对债券的信心增强
item.description: 茱比特资产管理公司（Jupiter Asset Management）坚持在其旗舰基金中投资政府债券，尽管市场对美国经济的乐观情绪再次推高了全球收益率。【原文：Jupiter Asset Management is sticking with its “high conviction” in government bond exposure in its flagship funds, despite renewed market optimism about the US economy that has pushed global yields higher.】

item.title: 财报聚焦 Seven & I 重组和利润前景
item.description: 在日本零售商收到 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 更高的收购要约后，Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. is set to report quarterly earnings at a critical time, with much of the focus on what it will say about restructuring and its profit outlook, after the Japanese retailer received a higher buyout offer from Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.】
